name: AI Response Time
definition: Measures the speed of AI responses.
goal: Reduce AI response time to under 1 second.
benchmark: Industry standard: 95% of responses within 1 second.

name: AI Accuracy Rate
definition: Measures the correctness of AI outputs.
goal: Achieve an accuracy rate of over 95%.
measurementTools: Automated testing frameworks, error rate analysis

name: AI User Satisfaction
definition: Measures user satisfaction with AI interactions.
goal: Achieve a satisfaction score of 4.5 out of 5.

name: Color Contrast Compliance
definition: Meets accessibility standards for text contrast.
goal: Provide sufficient contrast between small and large text and the background.
benchmark: According to WCAG (industry standard used to enforce international accessibility laws) The visual presentation of text and images of text must follow below ratios:

name: Keyboard Navigation Support
goal: Ensure all interactive elements are accessible via keyboard.
benchmark: Follow WCAG 2.1 guidelines for keyboard accessibility.

name: Customer Conversion Rate
definition: Percentage of visitors who convert to customers.

name: Customer Retention Rate
definition: Percentage of customers retained over a period.
goal: Achieve a retention rate of over 80%.

name: User Engagement Score
definition: Measures user interaction with the platform.
benchmark: Platform-specific benchmarks vary; aim for top quartile.

name: B2B Lead Generation
definition: Number of leads generated for B2B sales.

name: B2C Sales Growth
definition: Growth rate of B2C sales over time.

name: Quantitative Feedback Score
definition: Score based on numerical user feedback.
goal: Maintain a score above 4 out of 5.
